overview: On the eve of his 46 birthday, Mateo Torres finds himself longing for the life that's seemingly passed him by. Though he loves his husband, Calvin, he can't help wishing he could do it all over again. Then, one night, he's given a chance to turn back the clock. All he must do is decide if the cost is worth it. Produced by SideKick Productions, A Taste of Youth is the world's first queer, fat-positive horror feature film.
title: A Taste of Youth
